title: Historical situation of opponents of speech

content.question: Which of the following best explains the historical situation that caused opponents of Lodge to call arguments such as the ones in the excerpt “sordid”?

choices.label: Many Americans asserted that the Philippines should become a state.
Many Filipinos joined a nationalist movement seeking independence from the United States.
Many reformers asserted the racial equality of Filipinos and White Americans.
Many manufacturers claimed that expanded trade with eastern Asia was undesirable.

content.answer: Many Filipinos joined a nationalist movement seeking independence from the United States.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
